committees.name: Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement Subcommittee

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

committees.name: Energy, Climate and Grid Security Subcommittee

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Financial Services, Oversight and Reform, Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
